programGoals: Dramatically reduce Triglycerides ($240.4$) and LDL Cholesterol ($194.12$).
Allow liver to heal (reduce GGT $185.6$ and ALT $60.7$).
Reduce 41-inch waist size by targeting visceral (belly) fat.
Correct B12 ($106$) and Vit D ($10.7$) deficiencies.
Improve gut health and nutrient absorption.

corePrinciples.title: The 'Carb Curfew'
corePrinciples.description: This is our #1 Rule. NO rice, roti, or biryani after 7 PM. This will be the single biggest driver of lowering your triglycerides and reducing belly fat. Your dinner will be Protein + Vegetables.

corePrinciples.title: Nutrient-Dense Breakfast
corePrinciples.description: Your new breakfast is your 'super-meal.' It will be packed with protein, healthy fats (nuts), and soluble fiber (oats, flax, fruit) to fight cholesterol and fuel you for the day.

corePrinciples.title: Protein & Fiber Pacing
corePrinciples.description: Protein (Eggs, Paneer, Chicken, Dal, Curd) and Fiber (Psyllium, Flax, Oats, Chana, Veg, Fruit) at every meal. This keeps you full, stops cravings, and stabilizes blood sugar.

corePrinciples.title: The 4-Week Liver Reset
corePrinciples.description: Your liver is under severe stress (GGT 185.6). For the next 4 weeks (Mon-Sun), a 100% 'No Alcohol' rule is required to allow your liver to heal. This is a non-negotiable medical priority.

timelineEvents.title: Wake, Hydrate & Supplement
tasks: Take your Vitamin B12 supplement (on an empty stomach).

timelineEvents.title: Daily Workout
timelineEvents.description: Perform your 60-minute workout session as scheduled in your workout plan.

timelineEvents.title: Breakfast: Your Super-Meal
timelineEvents.description: This is your most important meal for recovery and cholesterol. Choose one option.

timelineEvents.title: Lunch
timelineEvents.description: This is your main carb meal. Follow the 'Lunch Formula'.

timelineEvents.title: Crucial Snack
timelineEvents.description: This is the 'bridge' that stops you from being starving at dinner. It is mandatory. Choose one option.

timelineEvents.title: Habit Swap
timelineEvents.description: Swap your evening milk tea for Green Tea or a Black Coffee (no sugar). Milk/sugar will make you hungrier right before dinner.

timelineEvents.title: Dinner (Carb Curfew) & Supplement
timelineEvents.description: This is your most important meal for fat loss. Follow the rule: NO RICE, NO ROTI. Your meal is 'Protein + Vegetables'.
tasks: Take your Omega-3 (Fish Oil) capsule *with* this meal.

timelineEvents.title: Wind-Down Routine
timelineEvents.description: This replaces your 10 PM rice. It helps you manage stress (smoking trigger) and helps your cholesterol.
tasks: Take 1 tbsp Psyllium Husk (Ispaghol) in a full glass of water.
NO phone/TV for 15 minutes. Read a book, listen to music, or do light stretches. This will help you sleep.

timelineEvents.title: Sleep
tasks: Lights out. Aim for 7-8 hours of quality sleep.

newEvent.title: Breakfast: Super-Meal & Vitamin D
newEvent.description: Today is your Vitamin D day. You MUST take it with your breakfast, as it needs fat (from nuts, eggs, etc.) for absorption.
tasks: Take your Vitamin D 60,000 IU sachet WITH this meal.

whyThisPlanWorks.title: The 12-Hour Fasting Window
whyThisPlanWorks.explanation: By closing your kitchen at 8:30 PM and eating your first meal at 7:45 AM, you are creating a ~11-12 hour fasting window. This gives your digestive system and liver a rest and is excellent for burning fat.

whyThisPlanWorks.title: Eat Healthy Fats to Beat Bad Fats
whyThisPlanWorks.explanation: The 'good fats' (MUFA/PUFA) in Almonds, Walnuts, Kaju, and Olive Oil actively help to lower your 'bad' LDL cholesterol and raise your 'good' HDL. We are adding these to your breakfast and snacks.

whyThisPlanWorks.title: The 'Carb Curfew'
whyThisPlanWorks.explanation: Your late-night rice/biryani is converted directly into triglycerides, stressing your liver and storing as belly fat. Cutting carbs at night is the fastest way to reverse this.

whyThisPlanWorks.title: Fiber-Loading (Soluble Fiber)
whyThisPlanWorks.explanation: Your psyllium husk, oats, flaxseed, apples, and anjeer are 'soluble fiber.' They act like a sponge, binding to cholesterol in your digestive system and removing it from your body. This is a direct intervention for your high LDL.

alcohol.title: The 4-Week Liver Reset (Non-Negotiable)
alcohol.rule: For Weeks 1-4, you must be 100% alcohol-free. Your GGT level (185.6) is a serious warning. You must give your liver a chance to heal. As you are 'open to quit drinking for a time,' this is that time.
alcohol.futurePlan: After 4 weeks, if your doctor clears it, we can move to a 'Harm Reduction Plan' (e.g., 2-drink max, 1-2 days/week, only whiskey + water, no sugary mixers).

smoking.title: The Quit Plan
smoking.rule: Your new habits are your best tools. Use the nicotine gum to manage the chemical craving. Use your new routines to manage the *habitual* craving.
actionPlan: **Craving Swap:** When you feel a craving, use a 'swap': Instead of a cigarette, drink a full glass of cold water and eat 10 Roasted Chanas. This gives your hands and mouth something to do.

**Goal Focus:** Your new 'Cardio Progression' (jogging) requires healthy lungs. This is the first time you are actively *using* your lungs. Connect the 'no smoking' goal to your 'jogging' goal. You can't improve one while hurting the other.
**Stress Management:** Your 10 PM 'Wind-Down Routine' is a non-negotiable stress reducer. Use it to replace any late-night smoke breaks.

breakfastMealOptions.title: Breakfast 'Super-Meal' Options (Choose 1)
proTips: **Tea Rule:** You normally have a morning tea. Have it *after* this meal, not before. Starting your day with protein/fiber (not milk/sugar) will keep you full for hours.
**Workout Pairing:** Prioritize high-protein options (Eggs, Paneer) on your 3 Strength Days. Prioritize good-carb options (Oats) on your 3 Cardio Days.

options.name: Savory Protein Plate
options.description: 4 Boiled Egg Whites + 1 Whole Yolk. Side of 1 Apple. Plus a small handful (20g) of 'Mixed Nuts' (Almonds, Walnuts, Kaju).

options.name: Cholesterol-Fighter Bowl (Oats)
options.description: 1 bowl Oats (cooked in water or milk) + 1 tbsp ground Flaxseed + 1 chopped Anjeer (Fig) + 5 Almonds + 5 Kaju (Cashews) + 1/2 cup Pomegranate/Berries.

options.name: Probiotic Power Bowl
options.description: 1 large bowl Curd (Dahi) + 1 scoop Whey Protein (optional, but good) + 1 tbsp ground Flaxseed + 1 cup mixed seasonal Fruit (Apple, Pomegranate, Papaya).

options.name: Easy Protein Salad
options.description: 1 bowl Sprouts Salad + 150g Paneer (cubed, raw or sautéed) + 10 Almonds + 10 Walnuts.

lunchOptions.title: Lunch Formula (Protein + Veg + Fiber + Carb)
proTips: **The Mutton Rule:** Your cholesterol ($300.9$) is too high for mutton. For this 12-week phase, mutton is OFF the menu. It is extremely high in saturated fat.
**Chicken & Rice:** You like chicken and rice. This is a great lunch. 150g of home-cooked chicken, 1 katori sabji, 1 side of curd, and your 1 small katori of rice is a perfect, balanced meal.
formula: 1 Large katori Protein (Dal, Chickpeas, Rajma, 150g Chicken, 150g Paneer).
1 katori Sabji (any home-cooked vegetable, try to include greens).
1 side of Curd (Dahi) or 1/2 cup Easy Raw Veg (Cucumber, Tomato, Onion).

snackOptions.title: Crucial Snack Options (Choose 1)
snackOptions.note: Do not skip this. This is your 'bridge' to a smart dinner. All are 'out of the box' and require no prep.

options.name: Simple & Savory
options.description: 1 large handful (about 1 cup) of Roasted Chana.

dinnerOptions.title: Dinner Options (Protein + Veg. NO RICE/ROTI/BIRYANI)
dinnerOptions.note: This is your most important meal for fat loss. If you order out, make smart choices.
proTips: Your habit of ordering Tandoori Chicken/Paneer Tikka is an excellent, healthy choice *as long as you skip the naan/roti/rice.*
Avoid heavy, creamy, or fried curries. Stick to 'dry' preparations (Tandoori, Tikka) or 'soups' (Dal Soup, Chicken Soup).

options.name: Home: Soup Dinner
options.description: Large bowl of Dal Soup or Chicken Soup (with 150g chicken pieces) + 1 bowl Sautéed Vegetables.

options.name: Ordering Out: Tandoori
options.description: Tandoori Chicken (4-5 pieces) + 1 side of Green Salad (No Naan/Roti).

options.name: Ordering Out: Tikka
options.description: Paneer Tikka (1 plate) + Mint Chutney (No Naan/Roti).
